name: aota-api-axios-nextjs
description: This is a TypeScript-based API built with Axios, designed specifically for integration with Next.js applications. It centralizes and simplifies HTTP requests, providing a clean, reusable, and scalable structure for interacting with external services. Ideal for projects consuming RESTful APIs within the Next.js environment, with support for middlewares, interceptors, and custom header configuration.
author: AOTA Desenvolvimentos
